trans-unit.source: Specifies drill-down and node viewing mode for an <xref:system.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner>, such as Flowcharts, that are used to compose activities.
Drilling down into the UI elements is allowed by default.
It can be disallowed by setting the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AllowDrillIn%2A> property to `false`.

Child nodes are not always collapsed by default, but can be set to always collapse by setting the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AlwaysCollapseChildren%2A> property to `true`.
Creates an instance of the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute*> class.

The default values assigned by this constructor are `true` for the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AllowDrillIn%2A> property and `false` for the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AlwaysCollapseChildren%2A> property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether drilling down one level into an <xref:system.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner> is allowed.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if drilling into the UI elements is allowed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the child nodes are always collapsed.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the child nodes are always collapsed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the function of outline view icon provider.
The function of outline view icon provider.
